org.jruyi.common

Interface ICharsetCodec


  • public interface ICharsetCodec
    A charset codec used to encode characters into bytes and decode bytes into characters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char[] decode(byte[] in)
      Decodes the specified bytes in and returns the result.
      char[] decode(byte[] in, int offset, int length)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified byte array in starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and returns the result.
      void decode(byte[] in, int offset, int length, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified byte array in starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and appends the result to the specified out.
      void decode(byte[] in, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the specified bytes in and appends the result to the specified out.
      char[] decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer in)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified byte buffer in and returns the result.
      char[] decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] in)
      Decodes the bytes from the given sequence of byte buffers and returns the result.
      char[] decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] in, int offset, int length)
      Decodes the bytes from the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length) and returns the result.
      void decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] in, int offset, int length, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the bytes from the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length) and appends the result to the specified out.
      void decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] in, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the bytes from the given sequence of byte buffers and appends the result to the specified out.
      void decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer in, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the specified bytes in and appends the result to the specified out.
      void decode(BytesBuilder in, int offset, int length, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and appends the result to the specified out.
      void decode(BytesBuilder in, StringBuilder out)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified in and appends the result to the specified out.
      byte[] encode(char[] chars)
      Encodes the specified chars and returns the result.
      void encode(char[] chars, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes the characters in specified chars and appends the result to the specified out.
      byte[] encode(char[] chars, int offset, int length)
      Encodes the characters in the specified chars starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and returns the result.
      void encode(char[] chars, int offset, int length, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes the characters in the specified chars starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and appends the result to the specified out.
      byte[] encode(java.nio.CharBuffer in)
      Encodes the characters in the specified char buffer in and returns the result.
      byte[] encode(java.nio.CharBuffer[] in)
      Encodes the characters from the given sequence of char buffers and returns the result.
      void encode(java.nio.CharBuffer[] in, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes the characters from the given sequence of char buffers and appends the result to the specified out.
      byte[] encode(java.nio.CharBuffer[] in, int offset, int length)
      Encodes the characters from the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length) and returns the result.
      void encode(java.nio.CharBuffer[] in, int offset, int length, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes the characters from the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length) and appends the result to the specified out.
      void encode(java.nio.CharBuffer in, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes characters in the specified char buffer in and appends the result to the specified out.
      void encode(StringBuilder in, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes the characters in the specified in and appends the result to the specified out.
      void encode(StringBuilder in, int offset, int length, BytesBuilder out)
      Encodes the characters in the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and appends the result to the specified out.
      java.nio.charset.Charset getCharset()
      Gets the charset of this codec.
      java.nio.charset.CharsetDecoder getDecoder()
      Returns a charset decoder in the thread local cache, or creates a new one to return if none in the cache.
      java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder getEncoder()
      Returns a charset encoder in the thread local cache, or creates a new one to return if none in the cache.
      void releaseDecoder(java.nio.charset.CharsetDecoder decoder)
      Releases the charset decoder to the thread local cache.
      void releaseEncoder(java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder)
      Releases the charset encoder to the thread local cache.
      byte[] toBytes(java.lang.String str)
      Encodes the specified str and returns the result.
      byte[] toBytes(java.lang.String str, int offset, int length)
      Encodes the substring of the specified str starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and returns the result.
      java.lang.String toString(byte[] in)
      Decodes the specified bytes in and returns the resultant String.
      java.lang.String toString(byte[] in, int offset, int length)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified byte array in starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and returns the resultant String.
      java.lang.String toString(java.nio.ByteBuffer in)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified in and returns the resultant String.
      java.lang.String toString(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] in)
      Decodes the bytes in the specified byte buffer in and returns the resultant String.
      java.lang.String toString(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] in, int offset, int length)
      Decodes the bytes from the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length) and returns the resultant String.

            BytesBuilder out)

        out - the BytesBuilder to append the encoded bytes

      • encode

        void encode(StringBuilder in,
            int offset,
            int length,
            BytesBuilder out)
        Encodes the characters in the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length), and appends the result to the specified out.
        Parameters:
        in - the StrBuilder holding the characters to be encoded
        offset - the index of the first character in the specified in to be encoded
        length - the number of characters to be encoded
        out - the BytesBuilder to append the encoded bytes

        void encode(java.nio.CharBuffer[] in,
            int offset,
            int length,
            BytesBuilder out)
        Encodes the characters from the subsequence of the specified in starting at offset ending at (offset + length) and appends the result to the specified out.
        Parameters:
        in - an array of CharBuffers containing the characters to be encoded
        offset - the index in the buffer array of the first CharBuffer from which characters to be encoded
        length - the number of CharBuffers in which characters to be encoded
        out - the BytesBuilder to append the encoded bytes

      • getEncoder

        java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder getEncoder()
        Returns a charset encoder in the thread local cache, or creates a new one to return if none in the cache.
        Returns:
        a charset encoder

      • releaseEncoder

        void releaseEncoder(java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder)
        Releases the charset encoder to the thread local cache.
        Parameters:
        encoder - the charset encoder to be cached

        a charset decoder
